page.title: 15Social Concerns in Rhos
page.content: Over the years Rhos people have never lacked opinions on many local issues. Two issues which presently concern us are; the future of the Miners Institute;proposed open cast mining. 100% of the respondents to a survey thought that the Miners Institute was an important building in Rhos.77% thought that public money should be spent restoring it to its original glory.94% said that they would use the "Stute" if it was restored 77% had strong feelings towards restoration. 28% were against the idea of restoration.Suggestions for its future use include: Sports centre,cinema,leisure centre,baths,concerts,(choirs,schools etc.),youth clubs,discos,plays,operas,bingo intersts for the unemployed and a meeting place for the elderly.
